trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnPaint%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint.OnPaint%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector.OnPaint%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph.OnPaint%2A?displayProperty=fullName> methods and any overridden versions of <xref uid="langword_csharp_OnPaint" name="OnPaint" href=""></xref> in classes that derive from them, when they are drawn on a workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Tillhandahåller data för den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnPaint%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint.OnPaint%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector.OnPaint%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, och <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph.OnPaint%2A?displayProperty=fullName> metoder och eventuella åsidosatt versioner av <xref uid="langword_csharp_OnPaint" name="OnPaint" href=""> </xref> i klasserna som härleds från dem, när de ritas på ett arbetsflöde designytan.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] `OnPaint` method calls occur when an activity designer, glyph, or connector is redrawn on a workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] `OnPaint`metodanrop inträffa när ett Aktivitetsdesigner, specialtecken eller koppling ritas på ett arbetsflöde designytan.

trans-unit.source: ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs specifies the graphics to use to draw the object and the clipping rectangle in which to draw it.
trans-unit.target: ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs anger grafik du använder för att rita objektet och urklippet rektangeln att rita den.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs"></xref> class with the specified graphics, clipping rectangle, viewport and designer theme.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs"> </xref> klass med angivna grafik, urklippet rektangel, visningsområdet och designer tema.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to draw the item.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> används för att rita objektet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the rectangle in which to draw.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> som representerar rektangeln att rita.

trans-unit.source: The view port in which to draw.
trans-unit.target: Visa porten där du vill rita.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme"></xref> associated with the object to draw.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme"> </xref> som är kopplade till objektet för att rita.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme"></xref> associated with the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme"> </xref> som är associerad med arbetsflödet designytan.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme> is used to describe workflow look and feel properties, such as colors, styles and backgrounds.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme>används för att beskriva arbetsflödet utseendet och känslan egenskaper, till exempel färg, format och spelarbakgrunder.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme"></xref> that contains theme information for the workflow.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme"> </xref> som innehåller temainformation om för arbetsflödet.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> in which to draw.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar den <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> att rita.

trans-unit.source: The area described by the clipping rectangle is the area on the screen that will be redrawn using the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> supplied by <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Det område som anges av urklippet rektangel är området på skärmen som ska ritas med som <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>tillhandahålls av <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that describes the area to draw.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> som beskriver området för att rita.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme"></xref> associated with the designer.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme"> </xref> som associeras med designern.

trans-unit.source: If a designer has an <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme> associated with it, the designer will use the look and feel properties described by the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme> to paint itself.
trans-unit.target: Om en designer har en <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme>som är kopplade till den, designern använder utseendet och känslan egenskaperna som beskrivs av den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme>att rita sig själv.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme>

trans-unit.source: If no <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme> is associated with the designer, the designer will use the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme> to repaint its look and feel properties.
trans-unit.target: Om ingen <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme>associeras med designern, designern ska använda den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme>ska uppdateras egenskaperna utseendet och känslan.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme"></xref> that describes the designer look and feel.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme"> </xref> som beskriver designer utseende.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to draw the item on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar den <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> används för att rita objektet i designvyn i arbetsflödet.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> provides methods for drawing objects on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>innehåller metoder för att rita objekt i arbetsflödet designvyn.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to draw the item on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> används för att rita objektet i designvyn i arbetsflödet.
